    3. Numerical scheme for solving the nonuniformly forced cubic and quintic Swift-Hohenberg equations strictly respecting the Lyapunov functional, D.L. Coelho, E. Vitral, J. Pontes, and N. Mangiavacchi
      Submitted to Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics
      [arXiv]

    5. Role of Gaussian curvature on local equilibrium and dynamics of smectic-isotropic interfaces, E. Vitral, P.H. Leo, and J. Viñals

      [arXiv]
